text: What will happen if a value is written a control system during communication error?

answers.text: Value will be written to control system when communication is brought back
It's not be possible to write a value during communication error
Value will not be written to control system when communication is brought back

text: What is a System Tag used for in iX?

answers.text: It is used to read acirro+ values from the cloud
It is used to reboot the operator panel
It is used to monitor or access variables from the system
It is used to debug iX runtime for developers

text: What is Text Library function used for in iX?

answers.text: To store text tables with values linked to each text which for example can be connected to objects
To store text files in a library that can be used by the operator
The Text library contains eBooks which the operator can used directly in the operator panel

text: What is a non volatile internal tag?

answers.text: A reference to local data value which is also saved in a database
A reference to a local data value which will loose the value if operator panel is restarted
A reference to value saved in acirro+
A reference to a control system register value

text: What is a data logger

answers.text: A function to track logged in user on operator panel in a database table
A function to store alarms in a database table
A function where tag value data can be saved in a database table
A function to store recipes in a database table

text: What is Audit Trail functionality used for in iX?

answers.text: Audit Trail function is used to track operator actions. The data is not saved in a database.
Audit Trail function is used to track operator actions. The action triggered by the operator is saved with a message, description, timestamp, user name etc. in a database.
Audit Trail function is used for identifying the operator using the panel with help of QR code object. This is saved in a database.
Audit Trail function is used for track everything an operator does. This is saved in a database and sent via email or sms to the operator's manager.

text: What does the Audit Trail logging strategy FDA stands for?

answers.text: Log entries are never allowed to be overwritten
Log entries should not be saved at all
Log entries are only saved in RAM
